itemDescription: Gossip columnist, magazine editor, talk-show host, author

wikipedia_page.main: Naughty But Nice Rob (born Robert James Shuter on 16 July 1973, in Birmingham, United Kingdom) is a gossip columnist, magazine editor, talk-show host, and author.

response: With only a month to go until the release of A Public Affair, Simpson switched the cover photo of the album. The first cover art for the album surfaced showing a sultry Simpson with her hair down, sporting a dress with the straps pulled down. Ultimately, Simpson's representative Rob Shuter told TMZ the final decision on a cover had not been made by the time one had to be provided to Simpson's record label, so the first cover option (of three choices they had) was given. The original cover was ultimately not chosen, and Simpson went with the cover eventually released. The chosen album cover has a casual-looking Simpson "with nothing but a T-shirt on", her hair pulled back and wearing a ring on her right index finger.

Joy Behar: Say Anything! premiered on Current TV on Tuesday September 4, 2012 at 6:00e/3:00p with guests Darrell Hammond, Al Gore, Judy Gold and Rob Shuter. The show aired from Monday to Thursday at 9:00/8:00c.
* "Naughty but Nice", a gossip column by Rob Shuter

The five original co-hosts of The Gossip Table were Rob Shuter, Marianne Garvey, Noah Levy, Chloe Melas and Delaina Dixon. Perez Hilton had been announced as a replacement host for Noah Levy in July 2015 before the show was cancelled in August 2015.
*Rob Shuter (born 1973), English gossip columnist, magazine editor, talk-show host, and author
In 1994, Sussman met entertainment columnist, Rob Shuter, in Edinburgh, Scotland. They were married on October 29, 2011.
